tv.source-info-name: Red Bull TV guide by TV

programme.title: Red Bull Dual Ascent
programme.desc: Sixteen world-class athletes on eight teams battle to be the fastest up a wall of six gruelling pitches. Duration: 2190

programme.title: Jack bids farewell to Ducati
programme.desc: It's the last two GPs of 2022 and Jack Miller is looking to close it out in style before joining a new team. Duration: 787

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: John John Florence's latest film highlights the historic 2021/2022 winter on the North Shore of O’ahu, Hawaii. Duration: 1174

programme.title: Magic Hour
programme.desc: The 'magic hour' provides the perfect light to capture stunning images in the mountains. Duration: 4290

programme.title: Au Revoir
programme.desc: The story of wakeboarding champion Raph Derome as he retires from riding in front of crowds and cameras. Duration: 5492

programme.title: Fabio Wibmer - Dangerzone
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes and find out how trial bike star Fabio Wimber and the team created the Video Game edit. Duration: 3238

programme.title: (Un)credited
programme.desc: Dive deep into the origins of Afro Dance in Nigeria and how it has shaped a global mainstream culture. Duration: 2751

programme.title: Leon Glatzer surfs Costa Rica
programme.desc: Leon Glatzer unpacks the incredible history of Pavones and explores its thriving roots surf scene. Duration: 1571

programme.title: Mateus Herdy explores Florianópolis
programme.desc: Mateus Herdy takes us the entire 600km stretch of Santa Catarina to meet the crew in Florianópolis. Duration: 1670

programme.title: Israel's vibrant surf scene
programme.desc: Surfing in Israel goes back to 1956. Learn how Tel Aviv became one of the surf world’s most vibrant scenes. Duration: 1472

programme.title: The Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: This action-packed feature explores the backyards and zones that pro skiers frequent to seek new experiences. Duration: 4660

programme.title: Broken Molds
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the origins of windsurfing and how it became one of the world's fastest growing sports. Duration: 4267

programme.title: Anywhere from Here
programme.desc: Explore the opportunities of the world of skiing through the eyes of a 11-year-old freestyle phenomenon. Duration: 4154

programme.title: Unfiltered: Horner and Newey
programme.desc: Oracle Red Bull Racing's team principal and chief technical officer reflect on their success. Duration: 2897

programme.title: Gose Gerald & Uganda Skateboard Society
programme.desc: Madars Apse meets scene-builder Gose Gerald and the Ugandan DIY skatepark crew who invent their own tricks. Duration: 1713

programme.title: Madars Apse meets Mike Vallely
programme.desc: Skate Tales hits the streets of Des Moines, Iowa, with the pioneer of modern skateboard culture, Mike Vallely. Duration: 1752

programme.title: Roots
programme.desc: Faction’s third feature film explores the foundations of freeskiing as seen by the current generation. Duration: 2808

programme.title: North of Nightfall
programme.desc: A group of mountain bikers set out to the most remote region on Earth to pioneer the largest mountain lines. Duration: 3787

programme.title: Bike Life: New York City's wheelie scene
programme.desc: Ride along with the vanguard of New York City's once-niche bike scene in this story by The Red Bulletin. Duration: 615

programme.title: The story of 8
programme.desc: Check out all the best moments and the winning moves from the Red Bull Dance Your Style World Final 2022. Duration: 1560

programme.title: Ball is Life: 3on3 Showdown at the Pyramids
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Giza played host to the hoops community at the world’s biggest 3-on-3 streetball tournament. Duration: 1337

programme.title: Chasing Winter
programme.desc: Follow Mark McMorris and friends as they prepare for the high-stakes 2022 competition season. Duration: 2522

programme.title: From the Inside Out
programme.desc: On a trip to British Columbia, freeriding friends, The Coastal Crew, document their joy of mountain biking. Duration: 2220

programme.title: Knowledge
programme.desc: In an introduction to the complex human connection to the natural world, athletes share their experiences. Duration: 1468

programme.title: Adaption
programme.desc: Snowboarder Maria Thomsen, painter Jessa Gilbert and surfers Hanna Scott and Sanoa Olin rethink perspectives. Duration: 1535
